      • showGroup

        @POST
 @Path(value="/show")
 @Produces(value="application/json")
 @Consumes(value="application/json")
public javax.ws.rs.core.Response showGroup(java.lang.String jsonInput)
        Post request to get a group if the user is a member
        Parameters:
        jsonInput - 
        {
  "session":"sessionID",
  "group":"groupID"
}
        Returns:
        {
  "id":groupID,
  "name":"group name",
  "descr":"group descr",
  "otherProperties":{
    "propertie1":"some text",
    "propertie2":"some other text",
  },
  "memberCount":number of members,
  "successful":true
}

      • showGroupMembers

        @POST
 @Path(value="/members")
 @Produces(value="application/json")
 @Consumes(value="application/json")
public javax.ws.rs.core.Response showGroupMembers(java.lang.String jsonInput)
        Post request to get a list of all members in the group
        Parameters:
        jsonInput - 
        {
  "session":"sessionID",
  "group",groupID
}
        Returns:
        {
  "memberList":[
    {
      "id":userID of the member,
      "username":"username",
      "email":"email",
      "name":"name",
      "firstName":"firstName"
    },
  ],
  "successful":true
}
